Project.name: PureMVC Ruby Standard Unit Tests
Project.Description: These are the unit tests for the PureMVC Standard Version Framework for Ruby.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in 1.0 * Compatible with the unit tests for the AS3 Standard 2.0.4 Reference implementation.
Project.Installation:
Prerequisites You will need ruby installed.
  • You can download ruby here: http://www.ruby-lang.org/
  • For Windows, the one-click installer is HIGHLY recommended, and includes rubygems.
You will need rubygems installed.
  • You can see if you have rubygems by typing "gem --version" on the command line.
  • You can download rubygems here: http://rubyforge.org/frs/?group_id=126
  • Expand the downloaded rubygems archive onto your system
  • Open a terminal window in the directory you expanded it to (i.e. "c:\development\rubygems-x-y")
  • Type "ruby setup.rb" to install rubygems
You will need rake installed.
  • You can see if you have rubygems by typing "rake --version" on the command line.
  • Open a terminal window and type "gem install rake"
Installing the Project Source Code From the Archive
  • Download the latest source code archive.
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a PureMVC_Ruby_UnitTests_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\PureMVC_Ruby_UnitTests_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
Running the Unit Tests
  • From the command line, change to the type: rake test
